info.name: Trello Darker
info.description: A dark theme for Trello. Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/97149/trello-persian-dark
info.additionalInfo: This makes use of the excellent Trello Dark Persian theme, removing only the font, RTL text alignment, and Persian text. I also adjusted the card backgrounds to be less bright.

data.title: Option for dark background on card when open
